E-waste is charged for upon pick-up and at the drop site. We charge $1 per electronic item and .20 cents/lb for display materials (TV's, monitors, laptops, etc.)

Electronic Waste (e-waste): Anything with a cord or a battery!
NO REFRIGERATORS, FREEZERS, WATER COOLERS, AIR CONDITIONERS. 

Hard-to-recycle items also accepted: Things that are composed of multiple elements or are made of materials that are difficult to recycle.
